about.summary: Provides generators for a high number of both single- and multi- objective test functions which are frequently used for the benchmarking of (numerical) optimization algorithms. Moreover, it offers a set of convenient functions to generate, plot and work with objective functions.

name: r-smoof
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.6.0.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-smoof
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/smoof_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/smoof/smoof_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d82dba9702eade00afb84c2c12167de6cec790be7d23ac227f8fe705bdcefc93

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}            # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_cxx') }}      # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-bbmisc >=1.6
    - r-paramhelpers >=1.8
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-rjsonio
    - r-rcpp >=0.11.0
    - r-rcpparmadillo
    - r-checkmate >=1.1
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.2.1
    - r-mco
    - r-plot3d
    - r-plotly
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]
    - r-bbmisc >=1.6
    - r-paramhelpers >=1.8
    - r-rcolorbrewer
    - r-rjsonio
    - r-rcpp >=0.11.0
    - r-rcpparmadillo
    - r-checkmate >=1.1
    - r-ggplot2 >=2.2.1
    - r-mco
    - r-plot3d
    - r-plotly

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('smoof')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('smoof')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/jakobbossek/smoof
  license: BSD_2_clause
  summary: Provides generators for a high number of both single- and multi- objective test functions
    which are frequently used for the benchmarking of (numerical) optimization algorithms.
    Moreover, it offers a set of convenient functions to generate, plot and work with
    objective functions.
  license_family: BSD
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/BSD_2_clause'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - khughitt

# Package: smoof
# Type: Package
# Title: Single and Multi-Objective Optimization Test Functions
# Description: Provides generators for a high number of both single- and multi- objective test functions which are frequently used for the benchmarking of (numerical) optimization algorithms. Moreover, it offers a set of convenient functions to generate, plot and work with objective functions.
# Version: 1.5.1
# Date: 2017-08-10
# Authors@R: c(person("Jakob", "Bossek", email = "j.bossek@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Pascal", "Kerschke", email = "kerschke@uni-muenster.de", role = "ctb"))
# URL: https://github.com/jakobbossek/smoof
# BugReports: https://github.com/jakobbossek/smoof/issues
# License: BSD_2_clause + file LICENSE
# Depends: ParamHelpers (>= 1.8), BBmisc (>= 1.6), checkmate (>= 1.1)
# Imports: ggplot2 (>= 2.2.1), RColorBrewer, plot3D, plotly, mco, Rcpp (>= 0.11.0), RJSONIO
# Suggests: testthat, rPython (>= 0.0-5)
# LazyData: yes
# ByteCompile: yes
# LinkingTo: Rcpp, RcppArmadillo
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2017-08-14 11:28:14 UTC; jboss
# Author: Jakob Bossek [aut, cre], Pascal Kerschke [ctb]
# Maintainer: Jakob Bossek <j.bossek@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2017-08-14 13:07:08 UTC
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
